content.title: Press Kit for Goo Goo Grapplers
content.description:
This is where the description of the game goes!
We have multiple lines of text here just to show you can do this.
content.history: Write a bit about the history of your studio, the game, the general background of you and your product.
content.features: Write about the technical features of the game, from gameplay to neat additions like multiplayer or cool integrations.
There are multiple lines here since these should be bullet points.
content.videos: Drop some links here, YouTube or Vimeo preferred!
content.images: Some images, from the game or of the game.
content.logo_and_icon: Where the logo for the game and studio go. Hi-res please!
content.monetization: Your legal spiel on what is and isn't allowed to be monetized.
content.about: The About blurb about the studio!
content.credits: There will be several of these!
